website_summaries.verdict: Buyers love this thermometer for the ease of use in cooking a wide range of meats, but some have had problems with probe durability or app features.
pros: Offers a number of modes, from beef and lamb to more general options like BBQ smoke
Backlit LCD monitor is easy to read
Use presets, or set your own
cons: Some reports of the graphing feature not working, or only working for temperatures up to 120 degrees Fahrenheit
Some buyers report durability issues with the probes

customer_reviews.title: Apparent junk. UPDATE 1/2/2019 Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Used one time a month ago and now it will not even turn on. Put 3 different sets of batteries with no success. No troubleshooting guide. 1/2/2019 An update from my 1st experience. The company contacted me to try some options to get the system to work. All to no avail. Thus they replaced the system with a new one which has worked flawlessly thus far. Thank you Morpilot for standing behind your product! Will update after a few more uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice thermometer probe unit. App could use some work.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to start up. The temperature thresholds are a bit of a pain to set and unset. I've had the alarm go off for no apparent reason, only to realize that I didn't unset an old threshold. The app is mostly nice, but it requires a threshold to be set in order to use the charting functionality otherwise the top of the temperature chart is 212*F. I've been happy with the wireless range. It stays connected most anywhere in my house. This unit has capacity for 6 probes and comes with 4 probes and a clip to attach one of the probes to a grill grate.
customer_reviews.author: abridge

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless temp transmitter for my smoker to measure the ambient temp of the grill remotely. This thing works perfect and has a really good range. My smoker sits out by my shop which is a good ways from my house. I can still get a signal all the way from the shop to the house, about a good 1000 feet away. The app works well and you can tweak what temps you are monitoring for. I used the included clip to clip the probe to the grill grate to measure ambient temp. Highly recommend...very accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Markham

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several of the more popular brands on Amazon and they kept going bad or defective. I then tried this one and it works flawlessly. Have used it for about 8 smokes and has not let me down. The bluetooth signal has great range. And the app on the phone makes thinks so much more convenient than carrying another part of the reader around. The only issue I have noticed is the magnet has seemed to have lost its strength. That's an easy fix though.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Durable six-channel meat thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this device for over a year to cook on a reverse flow wood burning smoker. Having six channels to monitor multiple external and internal meat temperatures has been great. The magnetic base is convenient it holds up to weather and is easy to operate. It has a feature on the phone application where you can track the temperature of the meat you are cooking. Being able to track a cooking episode on my phone has been really convenient too. I recommend this product to anybody cooking with fire outside or inside. worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Best Range So Far
customer_reviews.text: This Thermometer has the best Bluetooth range so far. I use this when cooking whole hog on a pit. I can place probes in the ham, shoulder, loin and that leaves one for the pit temp. Although it was an open area, I walked about 50 yards away for a period of time and never lost connection. Also, the batteries lasted the whole 18 hour cook. While I don't know the long term dependability, I have been very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this for even one year, and the number 3 probe port stopped working. None of the probes will work in it. Also, one of the probes reads about 100 degrees F too high, and it only comes with four probes, not six. The probes are expensive, too, so you are better off buying one with the correct number of probes.
customer_reviews.author: RDavid

customer_reviews.title: Smoking made easier
customer_reviews.text: Addition: I was sent 2 new probes. But one immediately malfunctioned upon use. I am following all instructions; these probes are a great idea but aren’t durable or reliable. Love the product but after the 5th use one of the probes stopped working properly. (Just after Amazon’s 30 day return policy. One probe reads about 50 degrees higher than actual. I ran all sorts of tests to ensure it was the probe and not the unit. I emailed Morpilot Customer Service to see about getting a replacement probe and never received any response.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Morpilot Smart BBQ thermometer unit does not work
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased many items from Amazon without any problems with the products. Recently ordered a Morpilot Smart BBQ wireless thermometer with with 4 probes. Installed the batteries and the unit failed to display any data. Thought batteries might be a fault, purchased 2 energizer AA batteries to replaced the batteries that came with the unit. Even with the new purchased batteries the unit would not display any data. Final thought, the unit is totally worthless. I would appreciate feed back from you on my problem. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: guvner

customer_reviews.title: Great product, outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised and is very handy for grilling and especially for low-and-slow smoking. The bluetooth works well from roughly 50 feet away and through several walls in my house. This is a great product and very reasonably priced. Morpilot's customer service is outstanding, as well. I've had the device for 6 months and have been very pleased with the product. I just got around to using my 4th probe when I discovered it wasn't reading the right temperature. I emailed morpilot about the issue- they responded within a day and sent me a replacement probe, no questions asked. Because of this great customer service, I decided to write a review. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Mari

customer_reviews.title: Must have for smoking!!! The app makes it even better.
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome!! The added probes are definitely a bonus. The app works great. No need to go out and check temps of the smoker or the meat. The app has a lot of nice features like graphing so you can see when the stall is going on with the meat. It is a must have for smoking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few  uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a gift for my husband, which came defective. I suggested we try another brand as it didn’t bode well that it arrived in non-working condition. Against my better judgement we ordered another one. We used it a few times and it worked fine. Then after not grilling over the winter, my husband pulled it out to use it last week. Totally dead. He changed the batteries and tried everything he could, but the machine just won’t turn on. Save your money and frustration and buy another brand. We used this maybe half a dozen times and now it’s too late to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: pjk1111

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Connected to iPhone app easily. My phone has not disconnected from the thermometer and I've walked more than 150 feet away. Easy to adjust meat/grill temp settings in the app, very user friendly. Temperature has been right on every time. Need to make sure probe is completely inserted into meat. I've cooked chicken breast, pork loins, rib-eyes and a few other cuts of meat. I would definitely purchase this again. Nicer than any thermometers I've used in 14 years of smoking/grilling food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of allowing you to monitor temperature and Smoker without babysitting it. It’s saved my arse twice already when temperatures dropped due to pellet feed issue. It warned me via Bluetooth phone alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Marina S Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, down load free app
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can temp up to 6 different items at once. Each problem can be set for different meat and preferred temperature. Can be away from grill preping other items and get notifications on phone as to current status of each probe. Happy Grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good product, that works very well.  However
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer works very well. I was expecting to receive the meat shredder, as it is in the product's picture. I contacted the seller and they made a partial refund, due to not receiving the shredder. The meat shredder should be removed from the picture, if it is not going to be included. I, still, gave the product 3 stars, as the thermometer works very well. Still, wish I had received the pictured meat shredder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  MK

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used this thermometer about 5 or 6 times so far. So far it has met all my needs. Having 4 probes is really convenient and the Bluetooth works really well. Accuracy looks good also and temperatures are within a few degrees of my smokers built in thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Jstanker

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: My brother relies on a thermometer when he smiles his food. This has been a great tool for him. Seems to be accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tami W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grill’n or smok’n
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I bought. Left the previous one out in the rain! Love this little thermometer it is great for smoking and grilling. Have purchased as gifts in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Appy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ihad some problems with the first Morpilot. It initially worked great. Good range on Bluetooth & alarms were accurate and audible. Morpilot saw my complaint and replaced the unit at no charge. They also included a pair of meat claws. Jennifer in customer service was great in seeing this through. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ChunkyButt

customer_reviews.title: Temp off
customer_reviews.text: Temp is off 2 degrees on two of the probes when i did a water boil test so a little frustrating to have to keep up with what two probes are what. Bluetooth range seemed to be pretty good though. I live in a 1300 sqft house and have my egg at the furthest end of my patio and had no issue with connection. I wish it had a option for a backlight that stayed on the screen module itself but seems to be set up best to work with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you are a grill geek like me.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchase so I could actually see temperature throughout the grill. Helped confirm my control issues with my GMG.UPDATE WILL NO LONGER PAIR WITH ANDROID. NO TECH SUPPORT. JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Scottwiz

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in the winter so did not start using it right away. Stopped working completely after 4 months. Return time had expired so could not return it. Would not turn on, with new batteries!
customer_reviews.author: MCW

customer_reviews.title: Morpilot sent replacement probes after leaving a bad review.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 probes were very inaccurate out of the box (at least 10 degrees off). I tested them all in several different ways. I have tried to contact Morpilot with no luck. I finally found 4 phone numbers online, but none of them work. Seems like they purposefully made it hard to contact them. MORPILOT, please contact me! I will happy to update this review if you make this right. Update: Morpilot contacted me and sent replacement probes. Everything seems to be working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Logan

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE application requires access to location
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth does this device require access to location information. SPYWARE?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon8675309

customer_reviews.title: Great item, yet not at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing! The blue tooth function is awesome, accurate and the range is awesome. Yet, sadly I have only had this for a month and 3 of the probes have failed on me. I get that the high temps can cause damage but aren’t they made to resist it? I would give it a 5/5 but I don’t want to have to keep buying probes every month.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Szeles

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best one I've owned. I love monitoring everything from my iPhone. It's truly awesome and I have emailed friends about it. I just hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for monitoring the smoker
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses to monitor temps in the smoker and the oven. Having multiple probes is a huge help. The Bluetooth feature works well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, loud alarms
customer_reviews.text: comes with 4 probes. I put one in the front, one in the middle and one in the rear of the roast and the 4th in the smoker to keep track of the smoker temp. It has several presets in it for different types of meat but I create my own for smoking. I was able to set it all up with my own presets and ready to use it within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from CT

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!  A grilling thermometer that works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I found a meat thermometer that works! I owned iGrill (junk) and countless analog thermometers. The Morpilot is perfect! 6 probes, adjustable cooking levels (e.g. Rare, Medium, etc.), and an easy to read display. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kochevar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, I love it. VERY easy to use. Syncs with my phone with the app very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: 4 probes included, wish there were 6. But it works fantastically. Love the app. Wish the chart worked, but the app itself works great with system.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya murray

customer_reviews.title: Beware, All the items advertised are not included
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've bought the item, and it's the second time that the meat claws are not included as advertised. Why can't I have want what was advertised?
customer_reviews.author: Bert Beddoes

customer_reviews.title: Did not last!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it three times but today of all days it has quit working. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Bowden

customer_reviews.title: No Hassle setup.
customer_reviews.text: They work great. There is a degree or 2 difference in 1 of the probes but close enough for cooking. I have a 3 rack smoker so I have 1 probe for grill temp and the rest in the meat, works out great. Syncs with my phone with alarms. To borrow a phrase "set it and forget it" .
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome to use with your smoker. You know the exact temperature of what you are smoking without having to open the door and ultimately lose valuable heat, especially in the winter. Just download the appropriate app to your phone and monitor your smoker from inside your house.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement probes
customer_reviews.text: Trying to buy 2 more probes and they are an off size from everyone else. Manufacturer has not responded to request to purchase more or to provide a link. The thermometer it self is great. But giving one star to manufacturer for poor response
customer_reviews.author: cody c.

customer_reviews.title: A good product for its price range
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price point, have used it several times now for smoking and it is functioning nicely. I like being able to monitor 4 temps at once and the accuracy is spot on (I tested in boiling water). However the cables are a bit flimsy and the smart phone app itself does leave a bit to be desired...still would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, was very accurate and easy to use. Set up was very quick and easy. Love the fact I was able to watch the grill and meat temperature from inside the house and not have to stay outside in the heat. I never lost connection will using this product always able to see the temperature. This price was great also.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer, have made some great steaks with this. Easy to use and set up, love the mobile app. Need more probes though.
customer_reviews.author: Hkguy416

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to pair with smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a little rainy in my area over the summer, so I haven't gotten to use this more than a few times. Having said that, I was impressed with how easy it was to pair with my smart phone and with the range. The app is basic but functional. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again’
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to grill more then one type of meat at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package says 6 probes, mine had 4
customer_reviews.text: The package said it includes 6 probes. Mine included 4. I've seen the same issue in other reviews of this product. Why is it hard for the manufacturer to actually include all 6 probes when they package the unit up?
customer_reviews.author: TheLAH13

customer_reviews.title: great thermometer. Four probes and smartphone app give great ...
customer_reviews.text: great thermometer. Four probes and smartphone app give great flexibility. I'll be getting two more probes to maximize its function.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Haldeman

customer_reviews.title: Every grill master should have one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use. Makes grilling, broiling, and smoking much easier. No more guessing
customer_reviews.author: APatterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome temperature probe
customer_reviews.text: The problem was awesome I Cooked a 90 pound pig in a china box and use three different probes I never had to check on the pig once everything went to my phone it was great I got to actually enjoy the party instead of constantly looking at the pig and checking his temperature great product
customer_reviews.author: Mark anglin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, took awhile to figure out how to use, but works great.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Package beat up and damaged
customer_reviews.text: O package came very neat up. Haven’t used it yet as it is a Christmas present for my father in law but I am hoping all works well. Almost seemed like it had been used already or that it was a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: victoria galvin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to use 6 different probes at once. I can smoke my brisket, pork butt, brats, and ribs all at the same time. The app allows me to monitor temperatures as well as send me an alert when my desired temperatures have been reached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ports 4 & 5 stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer and loved it. However after a few uses ports 4 & 5 stopped working. I contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement within a couple of days. Their customer service team is FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur S Thorsen III

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Monitor your meat on the grill or smoker and monitor grill temperature. Bluetooth works well. Alerts allow you to know what’s going on immediately. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works well, app is easy, one compliant is I can’t switch between F and C unless u down load the app
customer_reviews.author: keith richardson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: So easy, download app, plug in probes and turn on...all you need to know. ...works great, with temperature spot on.
customer_reviews.author: M2

customer_reviews.title: It's a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: It only worked a few times and then died. Changed batteries. Won't even turn on. Had it less than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Black

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 6 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap unit broke after 6 months. Logged warranty replacement ticket 1 month ago and no response from Morpilot. Do not buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonczar

customer_reviews.title: Bad probe know way to call morpilot
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit but one probe is bad shows 240 degrees all the time no phone number to call and see about getting a replacement so that is why I gave it 2 stars only used it once to smoke pulled pork
customer_reviews.author: denny vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this thermometer on several occasions from tri tip to chicken and fish. This is truly a great product and with the bluetooth capabilities I can be a part of the party now.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Murray

customer_reviews.title: That it works every time
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it linked to my phone, tha ability to have multiple probes the same time and the tiny small size of the pro tips great for fender cuts of meat
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the price was not bad either. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Products, Easy to use, and the app is Great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Greiwe

customer_reviews.title: Probes show in accurate temperatures
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the probes show wrong temp after 1 week of use
customer_reviews.author: Robert Siwek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermometer! I use it in my smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Linville

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but they didn’t send the meat claws.
customer_reviews.author: Schnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Meat Probes don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four meat probes went bad in less than 10 uses. I contacted the seller trying to discuss replacement and they never got back to me
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made, works super would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hire

customer_reviews.title: I really like the display in the app for the 4 different ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the display in the app for the 4 different probes. The app needs some improvement on the alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well and has good range outside. App worked well also.
customer_reviews.author: Fishigan

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE BEING ABLE TO BE IN THE HOUSE AND KNOWING ...
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE BEING ABLE TO BE IN THE HOUSE AND KNOWING THE COOKER ARE DOING .MEAT IS COOK THE WAY I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.author: FORD BOY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for smoking bbq
customer_reviews.text: Product was great! Really helped with how long to leave bbq smoking time.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Negrete

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 cook outs and now doesn't read correctly don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: JakeDwelder

customer_reviews.title: I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my husband to go with the smoker got him for Christmas. It arrived in time, linked to the app easily and the temp seemed accurate. The only issue was that only three of the probes worked. My husband was Morningside about it since we had the probe that come with the smoker. I was contacted by the company when they realized that their was a problem with the item. They sent us replacements. That shows that they take pride in their product and cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: MLE

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with a new smoker I recently acquired. I'm very happy w/ the product. It is simple to use, and accurate (as far as I can tell). You can track four separate temperatures simultaneously, each w/ it's own alarm. That means a probe on the grill for an accurate monitor of your smoker temperature, and three probes for the food your smoking or grilling. Steak rare, steak well done, white meat ready? dark meat ready?; it's all good and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little thermo
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for $40.00. GREAT little thermo. 4 probes? Bluetooth? Come on, this is a deal. Thus far, six months in and it functions fine. Will even give a couple hour "report" of temps.
customer_reviews.author: The Rads

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like the app for my Iphone,easy to install and setup.My only problem is it does not transmit the temp to the advertised 160ft. at my studio.My kitchen is about 80 feet from my smoker outside and the signal drops off repeatedly.The temp seems pretty accurate and the multiple probes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: l did a lot of research and settled on this one glad l
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time ,this is really accurate and reading from unit to bluetooth signal is exact there is no delay .l did a lot of research and settled on this one glad l did
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moura

customer_reviews.title: Failed after just one months use
customer_reviews.text: After using the product three or four times it now reads 180 degrees inside a piece of meat straight from the refrigerator. Upon trying to find how to contact the seller, there no longer seen to be any details with my order or on the sellers shop page. Dissappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Product works very well, but do not over heat probes
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and works Great with my smoker for perfect meat temp. I had used it in my Gas Grill and over heated 2 of the probes, so 2 of the 4 no longer work. I have contacted company and am trying to get them the order info so i can either get or buy some more probes.
customer_reviews.author: HAGGMAN

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Do the job considering the price paid. Only issue that I have is if I keep the batteries in the unit and try to reuse the it the next day, the unit won't power up. I will need to remove the batteries and put them back on to get the unit to work again. Not a big issue as it forces me to remove the batteries when not in use which is not a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Somethings cookin
customer_reviews.text: All this function makes this my kitchen Jesus! Multiple ports, easy to read, digital accuracy....and options, it has options! Easy to understand and Bluetooth to boot! Love this crystal ball of thermometry
customer_reviews.author: Ibuyabunchofstuff

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Was able to smoke multiple pork shoulders and measure the smoker temp all from one unit. App worked great and gave great graphs for my smoking temp. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve been better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, nice that it pairs with your phone for alarms. The screen cycles between probes too fast, would’ve been better with buttons to manually switch between probes. The temperature graph only tracks 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Works but could use improvements
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The probes could be better designed for insulation (they are very hot immediately after use so removing them from meat is tricky) and a cables should be a little longer too. App works but could be improved and cleaned up too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schober

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great most liked feature, you can customize probe settings, I use with a wood smoker and set a probe for a range to keep smoker temp at or a temp for alarm to sound for when internal temp is reached
customer_reviews.author: John L. Gutshall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sync to phone
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer makes cooking a breeze and safer. It takes the guess work out of the equation. I like the graph to determine when the meat will be done. One draw back is the range of bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: great value having 4 probes. distance from unit for monitoring is great. very sturdily built as i dropped it from 5’ onto concrete resulting in batteries popping out but no damage to unit. temps are spot on
customer_reviews.author: Proud papa

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it 2 times, and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it 2 times, and it seems to be accurate, now to see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Burch

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used it this weekend for a long brisket smoke. Was able to set alarms on high and low side to ensure soker temp stayed where it needed to be. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wildman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use it with my smoker. Bluetooth connection to phone makes it easy to use. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap,probes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for first two cooks Now 2 probes don’t read correctly and company will not return my messages for replacements
customer_reviews.author: DMF

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The best BBQ grill thermometer I've used so far. I like the Bluetooth connectivity, and having six temperature reading spots is great when you're doing multiple meats. My only complaint is they only include four probes. Why not include six and increase the price by a few bucks?
customer_reviews.author: M. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I wanted to have in a wireless thermometer. Connects via bluetooth, is accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man River

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & accurate
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time. Love that I can monitor it with my phone. Easy to set and like that I can use up to 4 at one time.
customer_reviews.author: B A Clark

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great item
customer_reviews.text: Just got ut haven’t used. Everything seems to working and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Saurer

customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 brisket 2 pork shoulder offset cook, worked well right out of the box. Ordered extra probes as I have had probe issues in the past with other thermos, however these probes seem extra robust. By the way the meat turned out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Richriley

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Works great I was able to monitor my meat while doing all sorts of chores. Amazing quality and I’ve used it in the oven, my smoker and grill with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Grill necessity
customer_reviews.text: Great asset for any griller. Easy to use and convenient with the phone notifications.
customer_reviews.author: lawlady

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This product came on time and does what it says it does. I haven't used all 4 probes at once yet, but have used 3: 2 in meat and one as a general thermometer for inside the BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes monitoring temperatures on the grill a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This makes monitoring what I am grilling on my smoker very easy. I often do several types of meat at once and this makes it a much better process.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Palazzo

customer_reviews.title: UGH
customer_reviews.text: Can't set temperatures on device, have to use preset ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
